Frequently Asked Questions

Is this therapy?
No. Therapists ask how the calendar makes you feel. We ask how the calendar makes you complicit. Legally distinct.
What if I need my calendar for actual meetings?
Ask yourself: does the meeting need you, or does it need a warm body that nods? We provide a nodding consultant ($800/session) for the latter.
My company requires shared calendars.
Our Enterprise plan includes a dummy calendar that shows you as "In a strategic alignment session" at all times. Nobody has ever questioned this.
Do you have a satisfaction guarantee?
The concept of "satisfaction" implies a timeline. Timelines imply calendars. You're relapsing. Please call the guilt hotline immediately: 1-800-NO-SLOTS.
What are the sticky notes about?
Our proprietary Temporal Intuition Framework™ replaces your calendar with artisanal 3x3 sticky notes in Pantone 389 C (acid green, naturally). Each note says one word: "maybe." This is the only scheduling commitment a free human should make.
